## AsyncParallelBailHook.callAsync() method

call listener with `...args` and `cb`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
callAsync(...args: IAsyncTapArgs<T, R>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  args | <code>IAsyncTapArgs&lt;T, R&gt;</code> | rest parameters of calling arguments and <code>cb</code> The signature of <code>cb</code> is <code>(err?: Error, result?: R) =&gt; void</code>. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
